name: Mountain boys: Shiba rescue
description:
Mountain boys: Shiba rescue is a platformer where you take control of two mountaineers. Rope tying them together is the only lifeline.

Conquer the mountains in this small co-op game. Rescue your barking friend from the evil crow.

Resources:

Keyboard art https://hyohnoo.itch.io/keyboard-controller-keys

Character https://opengameart.org/content/classic-hero

Music built with https://www.beepbox.co/

Punch sound https://freesound.org/people/thefsoundman/sounds/118513/

Background sounds https://freesound.org/people/klankbeeld/
